Vamprah::

The femme thought a second and said Vamprah "But you... well after I 
do the mission can you quit off that disguise off me or that disguise 
would be permanent?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Wheeljack:::
> 
> ::he nods to Vamprah::
> Wheeljack: Yes, im Wheeljack.  Since you are infiltrating the 
Maximal Base, 
> we need to give you a foolproof disguise, not just external, but 
internal as 
> well.  Im going to have to disguise your energy signature so the 
base's 
> scanners detect you as a Maximal.  We will also need to give you 
more Maximal 
> appearance, and giving you an alias wouldn't hurt.  Do you agree to 
all of 
> this?
